thread.title: Ravens WR Steve Smith exits with back injury
thread.title_full: Ravens WR Steve Smith exits with back injury - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Ravens WR Steve Smith exits with back injury
text:
| License Photo PITTSBURGH ---- Baltimore Ravens wide receiver Steve Smith Sr. left Thursday night's game against the Steelers with a lower back contusion, and his return is doubtful.
Smith had four receptions for 24 catches when he got hurt. For the season, the 15-year veteran has 29 catches for 373 yards and two touchdowns.
  Baltimore Ravens WR Steve Smith to retire after 2015 season NFL Game Summary - Baltimore at Cleveland Denver Broncos top Baltimore Ravens in battle of sluggish offenses Cincinnati Bengals beat Baltimore Ravens
